fields.summary: native ZLIB decompressor produces 0 bytes on the 2nd call; also incorrrectly handles some zlib errors

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

comments.body: This also adds a safety flag to turn off codec pool. I suspected the pool was at fault, and since it could easily have bugs it's good to have a safety option.
